collectible.title: Satgat of the Mithrarin
collectible.subtitle: Dust's Hat (replica)
collectible.text: A replica of Dust's hat. Sturdy construction, with black leather covering and cyan fabric draping. Grants entry into the "Stupid Hat Club."

collectible.title: Eye of the Storm
collectible.subtitle: Dust's Special Move
collectible.text: The Dust Storm is Dust's most used special move. With it, he can damage enemies, attract items from far away, and power up Fidget's projectiles. However, in the Inventory he seems to just use it to drive away projectiles fired by the other players.
collectible.unlock: Get Dust to use a special move in gameplay.
